description:
Iska asks his groupmates to leave while he fights the final battle against Mizerhyby.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyousei: Hakushu to Kassai de Demukae yo
Morning Star: Welcome with a Round of Applause
Étoile du matin – Accueillez-moi d`un tonnerre d`applaudissements ! –
暁星 -拍手と喝采で出迎えよ-
